title: Who was the source of Suchita Dalal in the web series 'scam 1992' of SonyLIV? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sharad Bellary, who worked at the PR department of the SBI bank, was the first among the people who informed Sucheta Dalal about the scam that was being pulled. Karamchand, who was also informant of Sucheta, helped her get information about the scam. Another person, as shown in the series (Scam 1992), was the governor of RBI at that time, S. Venkitaramanan. Check out the full article here[1]. PS: The answer is based on the docudrama Scam 1992 on Sony Liv. Footnotes[1] Who was the source of Sucheta Dalal in 'Scam 1992'? Here is the real life character info - Republic World
